channel.title: First Impression on Jakob Külzer

item.title: First impressions: Go
item.author: jakob.kuelzer@gmail.com (Jakob Külzer)
item.description: Ever since Google release Go I’ve been curious. Many good things were said and I always read bits and pieces here and there. Last week I decided to dive deeper and write some small things and get to know the language. So far I’m really impressed. This is a quick list of things I’ve noticed: Language The go language is full of nice surprises. I haven’t seen everything, but just a few things that really impressed me:
